lead_paragraph: The blaze caused a cascade of delays, detours and closings well into Monday, and service on the affected lines — mostly the D, E and F — was restored by 12:30 p.m.

headline.main: Underground Fire in Midtown Hobbles Morning Travel on Subway

snippet: The blaze caused a cascade of delays, detours and closings well into Monday, and service on the affected lines — mostly the D, E and F — was restored by 12:30 p.m....
